alert.note: Alert for Columbia (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:51PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Columbia County through 630 PM CDT... At 550 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Deforest, or near Windsor, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Poynette, Pardeeville, Rio, Arlington, Wyocena, Otsego, and Doylestown. This includes Interstate 39/90/94 between mile markers 116 and 117. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
